favorites.title: IT ends: Chapter Two
favorites.description: In this horror sequel, the members of the Losers Club return to Derry, Maine to confront the evil entity that terrorized them as children.

favorites.title: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker
favorites.description: The final chapter of the Skywalker saga sees the Resistance face off against the First Order one last time, while Rey confronts her own destiny.

favorites.title: Star Wars: Rogue One
favorites.description: Set before the events of the original Star Wars, a group of rebels undertake a dangerous mission to steal the plans for the Death Star.

favorites.title: The Princess and the Frog
favorites.description: This Disney animated musical follows the journey of Tiana, a hardworking waitress who dreams of opening her own restaurant, and Prince Naveen, who has been turned into a frog by an evil sorcerer.

favorites.title: Venom
favorites.description: When investigative journalist Eddie Brock bonds with an alien symbiote, he gains superhuman powers but also struggles to control his violent alter-ego, Venom.

movies.title: IT ends: Chapter Two
movies.description: In this horror sequel, the members of the Losers Club return to Derry, Maine to confront the evil entity that terrorized them as children.

movies.title: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker
movies.description: The final chapter of the Skywalker saga sees the Resistance face off against the First Order one last time, while Rey confronts her own destiny.

movies.title: Star Wars: Rogue One
movies.description: Set before the events of the original Star Wars, a group of rebels undertake a dangerous mission to steal the plans for the Death Star.

movies.title: The Princess and the Frog
movies.description: This Disney animated musical follows the journey of Tiana, a hardworking waitress who dreams of opening her own restaurant, and Prince Naveen, who has been turned into a frog by an evil sorcerer.

movies.title: Venom
movies.description: When investigative journalist Eddie Brock bonds with an alien symbiote, he gains superhuman powers but also struggles to control his violent alter-ego, Venom.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.description: Peter Parker teams up with Doctor Strange to navigate multiple parallel universes and stop a threat that could destroy all of reality.

movies.title: The Matrix Resurrections
movies.description: The long-awaited fourth installment in the Matrix franchise sees Neo trapped in a simulated reality, as he fights to regain his memories and escape with the help of a new ally.

movies.title: Jungle Cruise
movies.description: A riverboat captain and a scientist go on a thrilling journey through the Amazon jungle, encountering dangerous wildlife and supernatural forces along the way.

movies.title: The Suicide Squad
movies.description: A team of DC Comics supervillains are sent on a dangerous mission by the government, with the promise of reduced prison sentences if they succeed.

movies.title: Dune
movies.description: In a distant future, a noble family must navigate a hostile desert planet and its warring factions to secure their control over a valuable resource known as 'spice.'

movies.title: Black Widow
movies.description: The Marvel Cinematic Universe's long-awaited standalone film for Black Widow sees the Avenger go on the run after the events of 'Captain America: Civil War.'

movies.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
movies.description: The first Asian-led superhero film in the MCU sees Shang-Chi confront his father, the leader of the Ten Rings organization, and save the world from their dangerous influence.

movies.title: No Time to Die
movies.description: Daniel Craig's final outing as James Bond sees the spy come out of retirement to track down a missing scientist, leading him to confront a new threat to global security.

movies.title: Tenet
movies.description: A secret agent embarks on a dangerous mission to prevent World War III by reversing the flow of time.

movies.title: Soul
movies.description: A middle-school band teacher gets the chance of a lifetime to play at the best jazz club in town, but an accident causes his soul to be separated from his body, sending him on a journey through the afterlife.

movies.title: Joker
movies.description: A failed comedian in Gotham City turns to a life of crime and becomes the infamous villain known as the Joker.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
movies.description: Teenage superhero Miles Morales teams up with other Spider-People from different dimensions to stop a threat to all of reality.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.description: A struggling actress and a jazz pianist fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.description: The Avengers assemble one last time to undo the damage caused by Thanos and restore the universe to its former state.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief with the ability to enter people's dreams is hired to plant an idea in the mind of a corporate heir, but the mission proves to be more complex and dangerous than he anticipated.
